verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Peace give I to thee
Peace give I to thee
Not as the world gives
Give I to thee
Peace give I to thee

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Faith give I to thee
Faith give I to thee
Not as the world gives
Give I to thee
Faith give I to thee

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Hope give I to thee
Hope give I to thee
Not as the world gives
Give I to thee
Hope give I to thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Love give I to thee
Love give I to thee
Not as the world gives
Give I to thee
Love give I to thee
